Lisa Faulkner was a vision in a stunning wedding gown as she married John Torode.

The couple exchanged their vows at the glamorous setting of Aynhoe Park in Banbury, Oxfordshire on Thursday in front of family and friends.

Blushing bride Lisa, 47, was gorgeous in a white wedding dress with a very demure lace neckline and cinched waistline to frame her figure perfectly.

The Holby City actress carried a bouquet made up of roses, floral sprigs and greenery. John styled out a button hole to match her floral arrangement.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

In another snap, John swept Lisa off her feet as they posed with the woodland in autumnal colours behind them.

They struck a pose with Lisa kicking her feet back and waving her bouquet up in the air.

The MasterChef judge, 54, and Holby City actress held a stunning wedding decked out with lavish decorations and extravagant features.

The couple celebrated with their close friends and family at the wedding, where her 13-year-old daughter Billie was her best woman.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

During the big day, wedding guests offered eagle-eyed fans a teased glimpse inside the swanky wedding and intimate reception party.

It was quite the crowd in attendance including Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda Holden .

Both Lisa and John took to their own social media accounts to document the big day.

(Image: Instagram)

Lisa wrote: "The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks!

"Apologies in advance. Yesterday I married the man of my dreams @johntorodecooks and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love.

"Thank you @aynhoepark we didn’t want to leave! #allyouneedislove ."

John also posted: "Officially married the girl of my dreams yesterday @lisafaulknercooks what a day!! Thank you @aynhoepark ."
description: Lisa and John tied the knot in a romantic ceremony attended by their family and friends - including Amanda Holden
